p.p: This table holds the sweep transaction rejected by the system on account of insufficient balance in the account or any other account level restrictions like 'POST NO ENTRIES', 'LOCKED EVENTS', etc when accounting is called in SNP mode at the time of executing the sweep. The accounting mode is to be defined in the field ACCT.MODE in the record of AC.SWEEP.TYPE.

desc.p: Holds the AC.CASH.POOL record id of the failed sweep.
Holds the overrides/errors messages encountered which led to the rejection of the sweep.
Holds the credit account of the failed sweep.
Holds the debit account of the failed sweep.
Holds the date on which the sweep was taken up for process but rejected by the system, on account of overrides/errors encountered.
Holds the amount of the failed sweep.
Holds the value defined in the field RULE of the record in AC.CASH.POOL associated with the failed sweep.
